statements: UPDATE InventoryLevels SET current_stock_level = 50, reorder_point = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET product_name = 'Laptop', current_stock_level = 100 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET current_stock_level = current_stock_level - 10, reorder_point = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET reorder_point = 15, product_name = 'Updated Product Name' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE ReorderRequests SET current_inventory = current_inventory - 10, reorder_quantity = 20 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET current_inventory = current_inventory + 5, last_update = '2022-01-10' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ReorderRequests SET current_inventory = current_inventory + 20, reorder_level = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET last_update = NOW(), current_inventory = current_inventory - 10 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_info = 'supplier@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 1000, reorder_threshold = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New Location', contact_info = 'new@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET CurrentStock = CurrentStock - 5 WHERE ProductID = 101;
UPDATE Products SET Price = 15.99, Category = 'Electronics' WHERE ProductID = 201;
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET CurrentStock = CurrentStock + 10 WHERE ProductID = 101;
UPDATE Products SET Price = Price * 1.1, Category = 'Electronics' WHERE ProductID = 201;
UPDATE Products SET current_inventory = 1000 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE Products SET current_inventory = current_inventory - 5, reorder_level = 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_address = '1234 Main St, City, Country' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
